comments.body: No, `hg` works for roles. I initially included it and was told to limit it to `git` for collections.

@@ -1,1 +18,22 @@The ``version`` key can take in the same range identifier format documented above. If you're installing a collection from a git repository instead of a built collection artifact, the ``version`` key refers to a `git commit-ish <https://git-scm.com/docs/gitglossary#def_commit-ish>`_.

The ``type`` key can be set to ``galaxy``, ``url``, ``file``, and ``git``. If ``type`` is omitted, the ``name`` key is used to implicitly determine the source of the collection.

Roles can also be specified and placed under the ``roles`` key. The values follow the same format as a requirements
